SELECT
hel.HEADER_ID headId, heh.IS_ACCRUED objectAttr,
hel.LINE_ID lineId, hel.PERF_UNIT_ID objectId,
hout.name objectName,
houb.unit_code as unitCode,
hout.name perfUnitName,
houb.ORG_SEGMENT as orgSegment,
HPSSV1.DESCRIPTION as coaName,
houp.UNIT_CODE parentcode,
houp.NAME parentname,
hel.PERF_UNIT_ID perfUnitId
FROM hpo_expense_records her,hpo_expense_headers heh
INNER JOIN hpo_expense_lines hel ON hel.HEADER_ID=her.HEADER_ID
INNER JOIN hr_org_unit_b houb ON hel.PERF_UNIT_ID = houb.UNIT_ID
INNER JOIN hr_org_unit_tl hout ON(hout.UNIT_ID=hel.PERF_UNIT_ID AND hout.LANG='zh_CN')
INNER JOIN hr_org_unit_b houp ON houb.PARENT_ID = houp.UNIT_ID
INNER JOIN fnd_company_b fcb ON houb.ORG_SEGMENT=fcb.COMPANY_CODE
INNER JOIN hscs_pub_company_info_b hpcb on fcb.company_id = hpcb.FND_COMPANY_ID
INNER JOIN hscs_pub_soa_segment_value HPSSV1 on hpssv1.SEGMENT_VALUE=hpcb.COA_CODE AND hpssv1.TYPE_CODE = 'FDB'
WHERE
heh.HEADER_ID=her.HEADER_ID AND her.IS_NEW='Y' AND heh.EXPENSE_STATUS='CONFIRM' AND hel.LINE_STATUS NOT IN('C','R')
AND her.CONTRACT_ID=#{contractId}
GROUP BY hel.PERF_UNIT_ID
